## FailureDetails type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FailureDetails = {
    type: BaseTypeImpl<unknown>;
    value: unknown;
    parserInput?: unknown;
    path?: PropertyKey[];
    context?: string;
} & (
    | {
          kind?: undefined;
      }
    | {
          kind: 'missing property';
          property: string;
      }
    | {
          kind: 'invalid key';
          property: string;
          failure: Failure;
      }
    | {
          kind: 'invalid literal';
          expected: LiteralValue | LiteralValue[];
      }
    | {
          kind: 'invalid basic type';
          expected: BasicType | BasicType[];
          expectedValue?: LiteralValue;
      }
    | {
          kind: 'union';
          failures: Failure[];
      }
    | {
          kind: 'custom message';
          message: string;
      }
);
```
